Articles.Content:
The To Boldly Go mod is a project by me and @seanth but the sheer size of it alone makes it difficult to play without cheats.

I need someone who can write the following features into a plugin:

  1. Wormholes (Objects that randomly spawn in different places and upon entering SOI will teleport you to the vicinity of another wormhole somewhere else.)
  2. Jump Drive (Basically Hyperedit, but each jump consumes power and the farther the destination, the more power it will take.)
  3. Sunflare despawn (Currently the sky is ablaze with too many sunflares. This feature should allow the ability to make them disappear outside of a certain distance.)
  4. Star point. (To replace the sunflares. Each distant star should be represented in the sky by a tiny dot. This dot would be rendered as simply as possible seeing as there would need to be hundreds.)

Now. just a disclaimer, I'm not being lazy by asking help. Neither me nor @seanth have experience in making plugins, and I feel that the features listed above would make the gameplay lightyears better.

If anyone can help me here. Please PM.
Maybe for FTL you could ask other modders that have done mods like that to save time
